snippet: A leftist group said the move by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel was apparently intended to give Secretary of State John Kerry more time to restart peace talks.
abstract: Israeli leftist watchdog group Peace Now says that Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu has quietly suspended issuing of bids for new settlement construction, in an apparent gesture to Sec of State John Kerry as he works to restart Israeli-Palestinian peace talks.
lead_paragraph: A leftist group said the move by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel was apparently intended to give Secretary of State John Kerry more time to restart peace talks.

headline.seo: Israel Halts Settlement Plans for Now, Group Says
headline.main: Group Says Netanyahu Has Put Hold on Settlements
headline.print_headline: Group Says Netanyahu Has Paused On Settlements
